name: Moving In (itch)
description:
A Puzzle game about moving furniture.

Made for Ludum Dare 37 "One Room"

16 levels.

Keyboard: Arrow keys, Z (pickup,drop,check), X (rotate), C (undo), enter/escape (menu)

XBOX controller: A (pickup,drop,check), X (rotate), Y (undo), start/back (menu)

CTRL+M to toggle mute.

Please judge on Ludum Dare

Known Issues:

* You can't actually see a TV over a coffee table (but this isn't required to solve any of the puzzles)
